query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS adapted_content (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  messageId INT NOT NULL,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  originalContent TEXT,
  adaptedTitle VARCHAR(500),
  adaptedDescription TEXT,
  hospitalContext TEXT,
  usabilityScore INT DEFAULT 0,
  complexityScore INT DEFAULT 0,
  roiPotential DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
  implementationTime VARCHAR(100),
  requiredResources TEXT,
  adaptedWorkflow TEXT,
  adaptedCode TEXT,
  targetDepartments JSON,
  complianceNotes TEXT,
  lgpdCompliant BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  cfmCompliant BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  adaptationStatus ENUM('pending', 'processing', 'completed', 'failed') DEFAULT 'pending',
  adaptedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (messageId) REFERENCES telegram_messages(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX idx_usability_score (usabilityScore),
  INDEX idx_roi_potential (roiPotential),
  INDEX idx_adaptation_status (adaptationStatus),
  INDEX idx_user_score (userId, usabilityScore)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 46yA7HaDwBP5MYq.0cfa392d87a6 --database FgFuwHSp9rkJkcaPADwYhA --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS adapted_content (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  messageId INT NOT NULL,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  originalContent TEXT,
  adaptedTitle VARCHAR(500),
  adaptedDescription TEXT,
  hospitalContext TEXT,
  usabilityScore INT DEFAULT 0,
  complexityScore INT DEFAULT 0,
  roiPotential DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
  implementationTime VARCHAR(100),
  requiredResources TEXT,
  adaptedWorkflow TEXT,
  adaptedCode TEXT,
  targetDepartments JSON,
  complianceNotes TEXT,
  lgpdCompliant BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  cfmCompliant BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  adaptationStatus ENUM('pending', 'processing', 'completed', 'failed') DEFAULT 'pending',
  adaptedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (messageId) REFERENCES telegram_messages(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX idx_usability_score (usabilityScore),
  INDEX idx_roi_potential (roiPotential),
  INDEX idx_adaptation_status (adaptationStatus),
  INDEX idx_user_score (userId, usabilityScore)
);
